question: What the names Zahro and Jamshed mean? 2) What language Insha Allah we will talk in Jannah?Jazakaallah.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
1. Jamshed - the name of an ancient Persian King who have commissioned the
crafting of a bowl wherein he could see all he wishes, hence, the name,
Jamshed, meaning literally drowned / lost in a bowl. (Ferozul Lugaat).
2. Zahro - the closes we were able to establish are as follows: Zahra
(flower - Arabic; bravery - Urdu); Zahraa (shining - title of Faatima
(Radhiallaahu Anha); Zuhra (name of a star)
3. The language of Jannah will be Arabic. (Virtues of Arabic pg.8;
Azaadville)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
